name: Hand Headed Hooligan
description:
Yep your head has a hand on it, use it to get up to all sorts of hooligan shenanigans and activities! Explore a little creature filled town, play with the environment around you, and most of all have fun!

This game was made as part of my Game a Week class at RMIT this is the final game from the class and the theme was "Ragdoll World".

Inspirations for this game are Untitled Goose Game by House House, and Gang Beasts by BoneLoaf

Twitter: https://twitter.com/danfergusonn

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/danfergusonn/
